dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text:
Welcome to andOTP! This wizard will guide you through the initial setup process. Please pay attention and read carefully in order to avoid losing data. 

Don't worry, you can still change any of these options later on in the Settings.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: To ensure the security of your accounts, andOTP uses encryption to store account data. Here you can choose which method of encryption will be used.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: This method will encrypt your data with a key generated from a password or PIN. The main advantage of using this method is that external backup solutions (like Titanium) will work as expected, and it is much less failure-prone than the KeyStore. However, you will have to enter your credentials every time you start andOTP.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Here you can setup an authentication method to lock andOTP. Since you have chosen Password / PIN as your encryption method, a password or a PIN must be set to proceed.
